subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Sean O’Hair shot a season-best five-under-par 65 yesterday at the Byron Nelson Championship in Irving, Tex., for a one-shot lead against the defending champion Brett Wetterich and Anders Hansen after the tournament’s first round without its namesake. Nelson, the champion golfer who in 1968 was the first person to have a PGA event named after him, died Sept. 26 at 94.
